title: Update Google review link in footer to provided Taste & Tales reviews URL

requirements.summary: Replace the Google review link value so the 'Review us on Google' button opens the provided Taste & Tales Google Reviews URL in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/lib/socialLinks.ts`, `SOCIAL_LINKS.google` equals the exact URL provided by the user.
In the footer 'Social Connect' area (the button labeled 'Review us on Google'), clicking the button opens the provided URL in a new tab (retaining `target="_blank"` and `rel="noopener noreferrer"`).
No user-facing text is changed away from English.

file_operations.description: Update `SOCIAL_LINKS.google` to exactly: https://www.google.com/search?sca_esv=190a96a9d156750b&rlz=1C1YTUH_enIN1199IN1199&sxsrf=ANbL-n4ysIaDCa4jfFuKA9OBq5Xz-yZeMg:1771016063596&si=AL3DRZEsmMGCryMMFSHJ3StBhOdZ2-6yYkXd_doETEE1OR-qObc6Jbzq6uBIArRbHnZOQjhdBvO-cLGAHp0x7B_lQlagt349zrM2Si9ZmDeE9KJ_S6zD6tYcUcRGLg5ufxYmm9gHIcqWoNoaheMh3q1F29aVMy5sqn2q0spdGq68VhoW3gRvMIE%3D&q=Taste+%26+Tales+-+Multicuisine+Restaurant+Reviews&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiqxPL6rNeSAxWwUWcHHbAKJPcQ0bkNegQIOxAF&biw=1280&bih=551&dpr=1.5 (do not shorten, reformat, or replace).
Confirm the 'Review us on Google' anchor continues to use `href={SOCIAL_LINKS.google}` and retains `target="_blank"` and `rel="noopener noreferrer"`, without changing any user-facing English text.
